actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code with respect to the observance of Memorial Day and Veterans Day.

summary.text: Changes the observance of Memorial Day from the last Monday in May to the 30th day of May of each year. Changes the observance of Veterans' Day from the forth Monday in October to the 11th day of November of each year. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 6103(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code with respect to the observance of Memorial Day and Veterans Day.
